gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Knicks 123, Grizzlies 113
gameRecap.excerpt: The Knicks defeated the Grizzlies, 123-113. Donte DiVincenzo recorded 32 points, five rebounds, and five assists for the Knicks, with Jalen Brunson adding 27 points, eight assists, and three rebounds in the victory. Vince Williams Jr. tallied 19 points, five assists, and three rebounds for the Grizzlies in the losing effort. The Knicks improve to 33-18, while the Grizzlies fall to 18-33.
